resources.string: Chicken will vary in time to cook depending on the thickness of the chicken. It can be useful to pound the meat to make it thinner or poke holes with a utensil to quicken cooking time. Chicken is safe to eat at 165 degrees(F) and can still be slightly pink, so colour isn’t the only indicator of doneness.

A good way to check is to hold your finger in the middle of the chicken and if its too ho to hold for more than ½ second then you’re done. An immediate way to cook is to sear the chicken in a hot pan for 3-4 minutes each side and then finish off in the oven.

To begin were going to open the settings. From settigns we go to WiFi and network- WiFi. Now you will want to get the SSID (fancy word for name) from your wifi router. And then when prompted, enter the password.

If youre reading this, we assume you know enough about getting online that this guide will just be a small helper. Now we are going to focus on getting online on a mobile device. So you can get our updates as we make them.
This guide is going to teach you how to stay clean and hygeinic even without a shower

The best method just requires a bit of warn soapy water and a sponge. You will first foucs on sweaty areas and then just give the rest of your body a little bit of wipe down. You can then use dry shampoo on your hair. And if you want to go a little extra, a bit of baby powder over your body works a charm

After washing, you need to make sure to apply some deodrant to under your armpits and sweat- prone areas. An antiperspirant will prevent you from sweating where as a regular deodrant will neutralise the smell
